Repository Name Unauthorized: Frostburg State University, J. Glenn Beall Archives
Notes:
The Beall Collection Comprised of the public and private papers of U.S. Senator J. Glenn Beall, Jr. (R-MD, 1971-1977) and the private papers of his father, J. Glenn Beall (R-MD, 1953-1965).
The Meyers Collection Comprised of materials related to George A. Meyers, former labor secretary of the Communist Party of the United States.
The Perlo Collection comprises books, pamphlets, manuscript material, correspondence, photographs, and personal and family memorabilia of economist Victor Perlo, longtime member of the governing National Committee of the Communist Party of the USA.
The Price Train Collection Comprised of photos and film of the B&O and Western MD railroads and the C&O canal from the 1930s through the 1970s.
